metadata.title: CVE-2019-10172 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in org.codehaus.jackson:jackson-mapper-asl:1.9.xlibraries. XML external entity vulnerabilities similar CVE-2016-3720 alsoaffects codehaus jackson-mapper-asl libraries but in different classes.

criterions.comment: libjackson-json-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
